articles.content:
Annual meeting of Sweden-Korea Friendship Association held 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association was held in Stockholm on April 12.
 The meeting reviewed the work of the association and decided to more positively introduce Korea through the magazine "Korea-Information" and the Internet homepage of the association and others to suit the present situation.

Philippine President on friendly relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Philippine President on friendly relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The government and people of Philippines attach great importance to the friendly relations with the DPRK and positively appreciate the friendly and cooperative relations favorably developing in the new century on the basis of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries. Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, President of Philippines, said this when meeting with DPRK Ambassador to Philippines Jo In Chol who paid a farewell call on her on April 12.
 The president said that the government and people of Philippines would make efforts to continue to successfully develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the future, too.    
 She warmly hailed shining successes made in the DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. The Philippine government and people wish the Korean people greater success in their efforts to build a great prosperous power and reunify the country, she added.

"Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il E-Library" opens in Egypt
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il E-Library" opens in Egypt
    Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association opened "Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il E-Library" at its internet homepage on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 Seen on the first page of the e-library are photos of the three generals of Mt. Paektu.    
 Also input there are famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Korean books.

articles.content:
First vice-chairman of DPRK NDC to visit China
    Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- First vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Jo Myong Rok will visit the People's Republic of China from April 21 to 23.

articles.title: 10th north-south ministerial talks proposed
articles.content:
10th north-south ministerial talks proposed
    Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The head of the north side to the north-south ministerial talks today sent a telephone message through Panmunjom to the chief delegate of the south side as regards the 10th talks.
 In the message the head of the north side put forward a proposal to have the 10th north-south ministerial talks in Pyongyang from April 27 to 29, stressing the need to resourcefully settle the issue of inter-Korean relations by the nation itself through national cooperation.
